body: Lgtm.
LGTM, tested with a local installation, running it for past 3 days.
Alright. I'll rebase it once #1654 has been merged.
@sateesh-chodapuneedi please add unit tests to increase code coverage, break large methods into smaller reviewable methods. Thanks.
LGTM. Thanks @ProjectMoon as soon as #1654 is merged, we'll get this merged as well. Do we have any regression tests results, especially around the changed code?

Looks good on code review 
here is my LGTM
Given Travis has passed with 2 LGTMs and test LGTM, I'll go ahead and merge this after testing this across 4.8->4.9, 4.9->master.

Tests on 4.8 branch, all pass:

```
- Clean db setup works, last upgraded version to 4.8.2.0.
   | 18 | 4.8.2.0 | 2016-09-01 09:56:21 | Complete |
- Upgrade tests from 4.8.0.
```
LGTM, I've stated management and the DB got updated to 4.8.2

Tests on 4.9 branch (after fwd-merge), all pass:

```
- Upgrade from 4.8.2.0 to 4.9.1.0
- Clean fresh db deployment
```
LGTM, based on review.

Tests on master branch (after fwd-merge), all pass:

```
- Upgrade from 4.8.2.0, upgrade from 4.9.1.0
- Clean db deployment
```
Based on the tests and review. I'll proceed with merging this and fwd-merge this across 4.9, master branches.

Thanks @borisstoyanov 
Based on the reviews, db upgrade and local env tests, I'll merge this.
@jburwell this needs to be reworked now that #1654 is merged. Good to have the changes but not a blocker for 4.8, 4.9 RCs.
@ProjectMoon please rebase now, PR 1654 has been merged now. DB upgrades should not cause errors.
Closing as it is already merged.
The pull request has been rebased.
@jburwell @rhtyd Since #1654 has been merged. Travis and Jenkins tests have passed. Ready to merge this small PR.
@jburwell looks like @rhtyd already tested this. Do you need another testing? I am currently setting up my env
@syed we received the LGTMs necessary overnight.  Thank you for helping out.
Looks like it's ready for merging now.
I rebased master branch, I'll post test results for this PR
@ProjectMoon we need a test LGTM.  I inquired yesterday -- do you have someone lined up to test it?
@rhtyd let's hold this fix for 4.9.2.0.  I want to make sure we have had the opportunity to thoroughly test it before merge.
@rhtyd I have fixed the `DatabaseUpgradeCheckerTest` to reflect 4.9.1.0 being a `NoopUpgrade`.  I also removed the unnecessary 4.9.0->4.9.1.0 upgrade scripts and class.
@milamberspace I am trying to get this PR merged, but am running into some issues the git-pr script.  I am working with @rhtyd to figure out what I am doing wrong.
LGTM.
@jburwell we'll need that upgrade path class, we have some alter table changes we want for the 4.9.0->4.9.1.0 upgrade path, see the diff for changes you've removed.
@rhtyd good catch -- sorry for that oversight.  I have redone the PR to only rename the files and class.
LGTM

We can have someone test it. Are you looking for results of a manual test, reproduction steps, or something automated? A manual test is probably the best from our side because we don't really have the time to write any unit/integration tests at the moment beyond what already exists in this PR.

Tests performed:

```
- Upgraded from 4.9.0, upgrade path ran (whose sql file names were changed)
- Clean db deployment
```
LGTM.

Tests performed after fwd-merge, all pass:

```
- Upgraded from 4.9.1.0
- Clean db deployment
```

LGTM.

Tested on CS 4.9.0 to 4.9.1.0-snapshot installation.
(perhaps just change the comment below inside the SQL file to indicate 4.9.1.0 (missing .0?)
"-- Schema upgrade from 4.9.0 to 4.9.1;"

Logs:
2016-09-02 15:13:45,721 INFO  [c.c.u.DatabaseUpgradeChecker](main:null) (logid:) DB version = 4.9.0 Code Version = 4.9.1.0
2016-09-02 15:13:45,722 INFO  [c.c.u.DatabaseUpgradeChecker](main:null) (logid:) Database upgrade must be performed from 4.9.0 to 4.9.1.0
2016-09-02 15:13:45,723 DEBUG [c.c.u.DatabaseUpgradeChecker](main:null) (logid:) Running upgrade Upgrade490to4910 to upgrade from 4.9.0-4.9.1.0 to 4.9.1.0
[...]
2016-09-02 15:13:45,984 DEBUG [c.c.u.DatabaseUpgradeChecker](main:null) (logid:) Cleanup script /usr/share/cloudstack-management/setup/db/schema-490to4910-cleanup.sql is executed successfully
2016-09-02 15:13:46,019 DEBUG [c.c.u.DatabaseUpgradeChecker](main:null) (logid:) Upgrade completed for version 4.9.1.0

@jburwell sorry I've been silent, I've been on vacation for a bit and I will be juggling plans this weekend as well.  I plan to update this PR soon, and as far as a Marvin test I am not aware of any current tests that would cover this.  I haven't forgotten about this but it might be a few days yet before I can dig in fully.

Thanks @milamberspace 
Based on the tests and LGTMs, I'll proceed with merging this on 4.9. On fwd-merging, I've fixed conflicts and renamed a subsequent class to match the change. Fwd-merged master branch has also passed my tests.
LGTM thanks @nvazquez for the change. Can you help with testing, unfortunately I don't have the resources (some infra issues) to run tests across vmware and xenserver.

@rhtyd @jburwell Just re-ran Marvin tests. All passes including test_network_acl which fails without this fix.

@mike-tutkowski I've reviewed the code. it LGTM, my only concern is of migrating between two different managed storage when they don't have same tags (which would ideally be the default)
Also, here's a (roughly) 30-minute video I made that demonstrates this PR in action: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_pbnvQxTAqw&list=PLqOXKM0Bt13DFnQnwUx8ZtJzoyDV0Uuye&index=17
